$interpreted: Jing Yu: I'm here, Li Hwa. You should go eat something.
Li Hwa: This is no time to be eating...
Jing Yu: Sigh! You can't let yourself waste away. Wait here, I'll go get you something.
Li Hwa: It's all my fault, I didn't even check that medicine before I gave it to you... And I really thought this time we had it...
Lian Hsi: Sister Li Hwa...
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi!
Lian Hsi: Sister Li Hwa, I'm okay... Don't be so hard on yourself...
Li Hwa: But it's really my fault, I'm so sorry...
Lian Hsi: ...I don't want to hear your apologies.
Li Hwa: I'll get you something to help build your strength up.
Lian Hsi: Won't you listen to what I'm saying, Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: Don't move, you need to rest...
Lian Hsi: I've... I've already given up hope.
Li Hwa: What...
Lian Hsi: I can feel my illness getting worse and worse. It's just like Ma said, it's incurable.
Li Hwa: No, it's my fault, I haven't found the right medicine yet...
Lian Hsi: No matter what, I'll always be grateful for everything you've done for me.
Lian Hsi: I was so lucky to run into you and Sister Jing Yu by the lake.
Li Hwa: We were lucky to meet you too, but I really...
Lian Hsi: You taught me so many things, and took such good care of me. You were more of a real mom than my own ma.
Li Hwa: No, don't say that... *sob*...
Lian Hsi: Please, don't, or I'll start crying too... You don't wanna see that, do you, Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: But I... *sob*... wahh...
Lian Hsi: You still have time. If you keep looking, one day you're bound to find the right medicine.
Li Hwa: I'll do my best... *sob*...
Lian Hsi: Promise me you'll take care of yourself, and... If you ever meet someone else with a disease like mine, don't ever give up on them, okay?
Li Hwa: Yes... I promise...
: Ten years later...
Jing Yu: Li Hwa? What brings you here?
Li Hwa: ...I miss her.
Jing Yu: ...*sigh*.
Li Hwa: How does it happen, Jing Yu? How can we have lived so long, and still not found a cure?
Jing Yu: We're not omnipotent, like the Holy Dragon, Li Hwa.
Li Hwa: But I feel so helpless...
Jing Yu: I know you blame yourself for not being able to save Lian Hsi, but she wouldn't want you to stay so unhappy.
Jing Yu: It's natural to be sad, but you have to move on some time.
Li Hwa: ...Come on, let's go outside.
Li Hwa: (I'll never forget you, or the promise I made.)

Model.Text: I'm here, Li Hwa. You should go eat something.
This is no time to be eating...
Sigh! You can't let yourself waste away. Wait here, I'll go get you something.
It's all my fault, I didn't even check that medicine before I gave it to you... And I really thought this time we had it...
Sister Li Hwa...
Lian Hsi!

...I don't want to hear your apologies.
I'll get you something to help build your strength up.

You still have time. If you keep looking, one day you're bound to find the right medicine.
I'll do my best... *sob*...
Promise me you'll take care of yourself, and... If you ever meet someone else with a disease like mine, don't ever give up on them, okay?
Yes... I promise...
Ten years later...
Li Hwa? What brings you here?
...I miss her.
...*sigh*.
How does it happen, Jing Yu? How can we have lived so long, and still not found a cure?
We're not omnipotent, like the Holy Dragon, Li Hwa.
But I feel so helpless...
I know you blame yourself for not being able to save Lian Hsi, but she wouldn't want you to stay so unhappy.
It's natural to be sad, but you have to move on some time.
...Come on, let's go outside.
(I'll never forget you, or the promise I made.)
